28.eng-name: Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha the wife of the Prophet:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) called the salamander a bad animal, but I did not hear him ordering it to be killed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقْتُلُ الْمُحْرِمُ مِنَ الدَّوَابِّ
chapter.eng-name: (What kind of) animals can be killed by a Muhrim
